## Generator\_2.prefixLines() method

Prepend a common prefix onto each line of code. Intended for indenting code or adding comment markers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
prefixLines(text: string, prefix: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string | The lines of code. |
|  prefix | string | The common prefix.  The prefixed lines of code. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
